text: Baitarani Road railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Baitarani Road. Its code is BTV. It has four platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Baitarani Road railway station. ==Major Trains== * East Coast Express * Santragachi – Paradeep Express ==See also== * Jajpur district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jajpur district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Baitarani Road railway station
